fixes.name: Currency Selected
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR FXParam = SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As])
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    FXParam = "Reported", "Curr. of the Instrument Leg",
    FXParam = "Natural", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY],
    FXParam
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau CASE on [Parameters].[FXConversion] with a DAX variable using SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As]) for the parameter. Implemented the CASE logic with SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) and converted the [marketCCY] reference to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY]. The default branch returns the parameter value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
